channel.title: Lifestyle – Velvet Navy
channel.description: Relax in a world of velvet navy.

item.title: Post-Christmas sales HAUL
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello and welcome to a very exciting post (for me at least). In case you didn’t know, my present from my parents for Christmas was money to spend on the post-Christmas sales. So I used it for exactly that and I can’t wait to show you what I bought.   WARNING: There will be descriptions… Continue reading Post-Christmas sales HAUL

item.title: My New Year’s resolutions
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello and welcome to my New Year’s resolutions post! I’m not great at sticking to my New Year’s resolutions but I still make a list of them each year. I have actually started trying to get into the habit of a few of these early this time so that I am ready to ease them… Continue reading My New Year’s resolutions

item.title: Christmas pamper routine
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello and welcome to “Christmas pamper routine”, my first collab ever!!! I am buzzing to be doing a collab with the one and only Sophie who runs the blog Love, Soph. Definitely check her out after reading this if you haven’t already, you will not regret it! This post is going up on the day… Continue reading Christmas pamper routine

item.title: Winter Essentials
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Winter essentials Hello and welcome to my Winter essentials blog post! Iâ€™m avoiding the usuals such as candles and blankets which I have talked about in previous blog posts like “the little things that bring me hapiness”. So here we are, I hope you enjoy. Lip balm lip balm is an absolute MUST for winter.… Continue reading Winter Essentials

item.title: PMS Panel
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello and welcome to my PMS Panel! Here I will be discussing the ins and outs of hormones, cramps, spots, coping methods, cravings, and tips and tricks. I hope you take something from this and that it helps or comforts you in some way. Emotions: We all know that emotions, mood swings, and irritable feelings… Continue reading PMS Panel

item.title: Brain Tour
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello everyone, I have decided to try a new ‘series’ here on velvetnavy called “Brain Tour” in which i go through things on my mind, current feelings, ten things to be happy about, and current cravings. I hope you enjoy this new post and let me know in the comments what you think and what… Continue reading Brain Tour

item.title: Mindfulness
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Mindfulness is a brilliant way to wind down and remind yourself of the little things by bringing everything else into perspective. It is perfect for stress relief and a great positivity boost. It is often used as a therapeutic technique especially for people with anxiety. I am fairly new to actioning the concept of mindfulness… Continue reading Mindfulness

item.title: The little things that bring me happiness
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description: Hello again! Since i was MIA for quite a while between my previous post and the one before that, i though i’d do another post now to make up for it. So i am making a list of all the things that are making me happy right now, it’s a little bit like the ‘myÂ favourites… Continue reading The little things that bring me happiness

item.title: My favourites recently

item.description: Hello, this time i have decided to do my recent favourites, be sure to look around velvetnavy after reading this and take a look at my snapshots and social media sites which can be found on my about page. Anyway, enjoy:   Face masks Itâ€™s been so nice recently to just lay back and use… Continue reading My favourites recently
